programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in post-apocalyptic 2018, John Connor is the man fated to lead the human resistance against Skynet and its army of Terminators. But the appearance of Marcus Wright changes everything.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator who rose up from his beginnings as a slave races against time in order to rescue his beloved before an erupted volcano destroys the whole city.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: Jurassic World Rebirth: The Making Of A New Era
programme.desc: Journey to the most dangerous place on Earth in this broadcast special that takes you behind-the-scenes of JURASSIC WORLD REBIRTH. The stars and filmmakers transport you from Thailand to Malta, revealing sets, stunts and dinosaurs that have never been seen before.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: The evolution of America's most beloved sports, baseball, basketball, and football, are made possible by the innovations of sporting goods pioneers named Spalding, Wilson, and the Rawlings brothers.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From clandestine nuclear weapons programmes to a secret Cold War bunker hidden in the mountains, we explore the unlikely people and surprising places behind the discoveries of the top-secret information.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The Fellowship resumes their efforts in the swamp and are immediately rewarded with stunning evidence of large cargo being moved on Oak Island centuries ago.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The Fellowship is ecstatic when they uncover another structure in the swamp. And in the Money Pit, evidence suggests they may have come into contact with the elusive Chappell Vault.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths put it all on the line when they are challenged with creating their most dazzling Damascus knife. After a round, the smith who impresses the judges most will head to the final round.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: An Iranian American psychopath is thrown into city jail in Southern California. Before he gets sent to a higher security prison, he escapes by crawling up the plumbing chase of the five-story prison.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From clandestine nuclear weapons programmes to a secret Cold War bunker hidden in the mountains, we explore the unlikely people and surprising places behind the discoveries of the top-secret information.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The Fellowship is ecstatic when they uncover another structure in the swamp. And in the Money Pit, evidence suggests they may have come into contact with the elusive Chappell Vault.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: Investigators Andy Bustamante and Paul Beban investigate Bradshaw Ranch in Sedona, AZ, and encounter dangerous radiation levels, a strange temperature anomaly, and a UAP.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: The evolution of America's most beloved sports, baseball, basketball, and football, are made possible by the innovations of sporting goods pioneers named Spalding, Wilson, and the Rawlings brothers.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Rick heads to New York City to check out an original broadside of the Declaration of Independence. Will he put his John Hancock on the line for this multi-million-dollar piece of history?

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4)
programme.desc: A Milwaukee company experiments with something new. What starts as an unappealing low-calorie beer becomes the number one beer in America, sparking a battle between two titans for the crown of light beer.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: It's a wet day in Montebello and King Darrell is on a mission to defend his throne, while Rene and Casey signal their intentions to undermine his plans. Kenny gets entirely bowled over by his locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: Barry shows up to the auction ready to learn, bringing along a present for a hustler. Brandi and Bozek get a firm grip on a smaller unit that raises their spirits. Ivy treats his son to a birthday locker.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: England's Stonehenge and the Moai statues of Easter Island have inspired awe for centuries. But will we ever fully understand how and why these ancient sacred structures came to be?

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Freestyling on the road, Mike and Frank check off all the boxes on their flyer as they pick some real treasures.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: In Illinois, Mike and Frank comb through a mind-blowing historic marina while in Kansas City, Danielle brokers a deal on the mother of all burlesque collections.

programme.desc: As the participants get past the shock of being dropped in the wild, the ability to think outside the box proves fruitful to some but a detriment to others.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: More and more foreign students come to Japan to become certified auto mechanics and find long-term employment. We follow one such student, a young woman from Myanmar who pursues her Japanese dream.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We introduce a documentary program exploring Japanese Ig Nobel laureates and the serious aims and stories behind their humorous, thought-provoking research.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous? Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. The pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Benny gain the confidence to sing at the Canta Conmigo show.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora rescues Boots and her friends from Benny's out-of-control balloon so they can all go to La Reina's castle party.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots meet Shelly, a hermit crab missing her shell. Papi is having a quesadilla picnic, but he forgot the ingredients! Dora sets off to deliver them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 3
programme.desc: Reeling from failure, Jordan begins to spiral, while Jonathan discovers newfound strength. General Lane recruits John Henry and Natalie Irons to the DOD.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 20
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test their craziest hack yet: cooking a three-course meal under the hood of a car…while driving! Plus, Kevin finds out who can spot his fresh breath hack, and one family spends three months living in a Hack House.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Arrow S2 10
programme.desc: After a fight with Cyrus Gold (aka the Acolyte), Oliver is drugged and left for dead. Determined to save him, Felicity's cure causes Oliver to hallucinate, and confront his past.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark! Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 3
programme.desc: While the pressures of being in space starts to take its toll on Howard, Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, Alex (guest star MARGO HARSHMAN).

programme.title: Friends S6 24
programme.desc: Chandler's romantic marriage proposal is ruined when Monica's former boyfriend returns. (Part 1)

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Lonely Ah Zhen is bullied by his coworkers. When he spends his birthday with Yumi, his friends shockingly discover that Yumi is an inflatable doll. Seeking companionship, Ah Zhen turns to the internet and finds his ideal girl Mina. Her arrival transforms his life but a series of unexpected events unfold as her identity as a vampire is revealed.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade
programme.desc: Marc spends all his free time working as a volunteer with Les Petits Freres des Pauvres. Clemence Castel takes him to explore the hidden secrets of Mont Saint Michel and also invites him to achieve one of his dreams: a parachute jump.

programme.title: Grandeur Nature
programme.desc: At the Fourneau Saint-Michel, accompanied by Thierry Petit, Adrien goes out to meet people who need a ''green'' experience. This quest for well-being is also accompanied by music, thanks to the talent of accordionist Didier Laloy.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco
programme.desc: Vintage kitchen, vibrant colours, retro decoration: in the suburbs of Strasbourg, Aurelie and Alexandre have re-designed a 1970s house.

programme.title: Louis De Funes, Le Rire eternel
programme.desc: Louis de Funes' career was nothing if not eventful. Son of an immigrant family from Andalucía, he tried his hand at innumerable trades, including bar pianist, before finally achieving fame as a comic actor. It wasn't until his fifties that his relentless perseverance rewarded him with his first major roles.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Leila Albert prepares lobster rolls.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Defile Du 14 Juillet 2025
programme.desc: A special programme to mark France's national day, 14 July.

programme.title: Terre Nourriciere
programme.desc: Melanie meets master falconers to learn more about the relationship that has existed between birds of prey and man for over 4,000 years. She is taken on a small game hunt and learns about the challenges and culture of this practice.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: We discover the fascinating world of spiders in the company of circus artist and contortionist Emi Vauthey, who agreed to transform herself before our very eyes!

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Monde De Jamy
programme.desc: Roussillon apricots, Tomme de Savoie cheese, Burgundy wine: how is global warming affecting France's traditional regional products? With increasingly regular droughts in the south of France and rapidly rising prices, an investigation into those who have already had to adapt to change, often over generations.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Entering the world of Quentin Garel, is like stepping onto an unknown planet filled with animal sculptures that defy the imagination. Creatures he brings vividly to life in his studio deep in rural Normandy...

programme.title: Sauver Ou Perir
programme.desc: Franck, a fireman in Paris, is happy. He loves his job, his wife has just given birth to twins... But soon, his life turns upside-down. Severely burned during a difficult operation whilst trying to save his men, his face melted in the flames. He now begins a long, slow reconstruction...

programme.title: Code Rose
programme.desc: In the middle of the sea a pink flamingo lands on an aircraft carrier. To keep the runway safe, military personnel have to coax it to fly away. But the bird and its companions settle unrelentingly on the war machine.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Julietta is hesitant about including Belinda in the photo shoot she's preparing for her store. Worried about the cost to his family of his new accessibility equipment, Leon finds himself a job.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Ricardo and Leon are alone in the house. Ricardo makes the most of the opportunity to organise a little party with his friends, plus Florence and Doris.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Florence realises that Leon fancies her and she helps him to go through Francis's archives in search of information about Marianne. Leon discovers that his mother had been hiding an enormous secret.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Chargeurs Reunis, a company at the cutting edge of textile innovation. Do you know why the bicycle used to be known as ''the little queen''? At MHP, the Poisson family restores Boulle work furniture and objects. The hooded dress makes a comeback. Charlie Le Mindu combines fashion and haute coiffure.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: We discover the fascinating world of spiders in the company of circus artist and contortionist Emi Vauthey, who agreed to transform herself before our very eyes!

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: A museum of fine arts located in Pasadena, north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum offers an impressive collection of European paintings. The impressionist trend is notably represented by Corot, Courbet, Morisot, Pissarro, Manet, Monet, Renoir, Degas...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Louis De Funes, Le Rire eternel
programme.desc: The comic genius of Louis de Funes (1914-1983) has travelled down the years and lost none of its vitality, as shown by the continuing success of his films many of which have become classics. Personal stories and archive footage of the ''nicest angry man ever'', as Patrice Leconte called him.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: En Vadrouille
programme.desc: Loïc Ballet traces the footsteps of the kings of France in the Bourbonnais region, the stage of the history of the greatest sovereigns. He visits the Château de Lapalisse, the Couleur du temps house, and the Château de Peufeilhoux.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Brush ep 2
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: Encounter ep 22
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 8
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Blue Jeans ep 10
programme.desc: BLUE JEANS is a youth-oriented drama that follows the intersecting and intertwining lives of 6 present-day Filipino working students in the university belt.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 9
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 50
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 35
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: For the Love ep 2
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.
